That one is unfortunately a lost cause.  My example (not cho) is 7 mm thick at the rim and 5 mm at the seppa dai.  The diameter is 84 x 80 mm.

Jim



  The best known Iyo Shoami Cho tsuba is larger, but not so thick.  I've seen many examples of this tsuba, many <sigh> not so worn as this one.

  http://zincavage.org/ChoTsuba.html
